articles.author: Stella Qiu
articles.title: Asian shares subdued after US tech falters, dollar and yields hold gains - Reuters.com
articles.description: Asian shares were subdued on Friday after earnings reports from Tesla and Netflix failed to dazzle, while the dollar and Treasury yields held gains ahead of an action-packed week that could see the end of the U.S. tightening cycle.
articles.content: SYDNEY, July 21 (Reuters) - Asian shares were subdued on Friday after earnings reports from Tesla and Netflix failed to dazzle, while the dollar and Treasury yields held gains ahead of an action-pack… [+3800 chars]
